metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45985 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Lua 5.4.3, an erroneous finalizer called during a tail call leads to aheap-based buffer over-read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-45985` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblua5.4-0 - 5.4.4-1
lua5.4 - 5.4.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lua5.4 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.4-1').
darktable package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
tup package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
vifm package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
